column1: Baby Barnaby's////What a place to people watch
column2: or to take in the sun and enjoy the morning.  Sadly
column3: I was unimpressed with the food.  Don't get me wrong
column6: I sort of expected a Snow White breakfast.  You know
column7: the kind of breakfast brought to you by all the creatures of the forest on a perfectly prepared platter.  However
column8: it tasted like a run-of-the-mill type breakfast.  I wouldn't wait more than 30 minutes.  Now if you can score some of their coffee
column9: you'll be in for a treat.
